about.title: About me
about.heading: My name is Roman and I'm a web-engineer.
about.main1: Rather than being a portfolio-like site this web app is more dedicated to experiments and best practices I'm using in my work.
about.main2: If you'd like to know more about me personally a linkedIn page or my github would give you much better perspectives.
